function.name: channel_setByName
function.description: This function is used to turn on a specified television channel by name.

location.description: The location where the device is located. e.g. home, office, etc.

room.description: The room where the device is located.  e.g. living room, bedroom, bathroom, etc.

device.description: The name or type of the device on which the channel needs to be set. e.g. TV, smart monitor, etc.

compartment.description: A predefined compartment associated with the device.

channel.description: The name of the channel to be turned on. e.g. HBO, MTV, etc.
